title: Placeholder Note
content: A note to give flavor a the beginning of the game. To be written later.

title: The Studio
content: Some might say that it is just Vince Castellum’s late grandmother’s old apartment, invaded by coffee cups and weirdos with typewriters… but, in truth, the studio is the creative home of everyone who contributes to the issues of Modern Bestiary, our beloved-by-nut-jobs magazine.
It’s also the home of a stray cat called Kenshin.
